content: this trifold crochet bag pattern could not be any simpler it is just a rectangle that is then folded in a few steps to create the shape a few stitched seams to finish it up and then you re done this is such an easy and fun project please note that there is an ad-free pdf version of this pattern available for purchase in my ravelry shop to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/trifold-crochet-bag-coconut-cakes materials 487 yards weight 4 medium yarn sample uses yarnspirations caron coconut cakes in blueberry sorbet 78% cotton 22% polyester 8oz/227g 481yds/440m us i/ 5 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors one pre-made handle sample shows 23 handle needle and thread for sewing on handle finished size 16 tall x 15 wide abbreviation key chain chain skip skip st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch fsc foundation single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet
